scripts.beautify: pnpm run format && pnpm run eslint:fix
scripts.publish:canary: RELEASE_TYPE=canary pnpm run version && RELEASE_TYPE=canary pnpm run publish
scripts.publish:stable: RELEASE_TYPE=stable pnpm run version && RELEASE_TYPE=stable pnpm run publish
scripts.publish:major: RELEASE_TYPE=stable pnpm run version major && RELEASE_TYPE=stable pnpm run publish
scripts.publish:minor: RELEASE_TYPE=stable pnpm run version minor && RELEASE_TYPE=stable pnpm run publish
scripts.publish:patch: RELEASE_TYPE=stable pnpm run version patch && RELEASE_TYPE=stable pnpm run publish
scripts.clean:all: pnpm run clean:buildinfo && pnpm run clean:turbo && pnpm run clean:node && pnpm run clean:dist
